p.b: For each day's reading question, write your name, section, table, and group number on the upper right hand corner of your answer and hand it in at the start of class that day
Nov 14/15 W11D1 Rolling without Slipping, Translation and Rotation

problem.p: (1) What does rolling without slipping meaning?

(2) Suppose a bicycle wheel of radius \(R\) is rolling without slipping along a level surface with center-of-mass velocity \(\vec{\mathbf{V}} _{cm}\) . What is the velocity of a point on the rim with respect to the ground in each of the four positions A, B, C, and D as shown in the figure below?
